content: --यामिन् {%<ab>m.</ab>%} {1} regulating the soul or internal feelings, soul; Providence, Supreme Spirit as guiding and regulating mankind, Brahma; according to the <ls>Bṛ. Ār. Up.</ls> अंतर्यामिन् ‘the internal check’ is the Supreme Being and not the individual soul; ‘who standing in the earth is other than the earth, whom the earth knows not, whose body the earth is, who internally restrains and governs the earth; the same is {%thy%} soul (and mine), the internal check अंतर्यामिन्, &c. &c.; अंतराविश्य भूतानि यो बिभर्त्यात्मकेतुभिः . अंतर्यामीश्वरः साक्षाद्भवेत् &c. {2} wind;
